import React from 'react'; import { useDropzone } from 'react-dropzone'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import fileBackground from '../img/fileBackground.png'; const Submit = () => { const { acceptedFiles, getRootProps, getInputProps } = useDropzone(); const files = acceptedFiles.map((file) => (
  • {file.path} - {file.size} bytes
    • )); return (

    Submit a design!

    If you have an open source design to contribute to the makerspace, please submit it here!

    Design Name Category Description Proof of Certification To be certified on Resource 19, a design has to provide proof of approval by one of the following institutions: CDC, ECDC, FDA, NIH, or WHO. Designs approved by individual research institiutions such as Universities or others may also be approved on a case by case basis Please provide proof of approval below in the form of a link. Would you like to submit your design for certification? Materials Tools Required Links (Links separated by commas) Images (JPG, PNG)

    Drag and Drop
    - or -
    Click to Upload

    Files

      {files}
    Attachments (PDFs, CAD files, etc.)     Give credit where credit is due. Who made this design possible?
    ); }; const style = { BodyContent: { margin: '0 10% 3rem 10%', }, HeaderSection: { background: '#EBF0F3', padding: '1rem 10%', }, Header1: { fontSize: '42px', color: '#3B628B', margin: '.3rem 0 0 0', }, Subtitle: { fontSize: '24px', fontWeight: '300', color: '#3B628B', paddingTop: '0.8rem', marginBottom: '0', }, FormHeader: { fontSize: '20px', fontWeight: '400', margin: '1rem 0 0.2rem 0', }, FormSubtitle: { fontSize: '16px', fontWeight: '300', marginBottom: '0.4rem', }, }; export default Submit;
